Name: The Party of Demons
About the game: Description The Party of Demons is a high pace, competition bullet hell game. It contains well-designed bullets and awesome background music. You can even compete with your friend in this game. well-designed Bullets. You can compete with your friend in this game. 13 original background music. 14 unique characters with different magic skills. 4 difficulty options. Everyone can have fun in it. How To Play Dodge the bullets on the screen Shoot the birds to gain mana and cast bullets on your rival's screen. Chant and release magic to defend/attack Whoever stand the last wins How To Control Keyboard: Move: up, down, left, right Slowdown: left shift Chant/Release magic: Z Burst rune: X Fire/Hold fire: C Select rune: A, S Gamepad: Move: left stick Slowdown: A Chant/Release magic: X Burst rune: B Fire/Hold fire: Y Select rune: left shoulder, right shoulder Mouse: Move: Move the mouse Slowdown: left key Chant/Release magic: right key Burst rune: middle key Fire/Hold fire: you cannot hold fire when using a mouse Select rune: wheel up, wheel down
